content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or emotions, but I can provide some notable and influential songs that prominently feature the organ:

1. "Whiter Shade of Pale" by Procol Harum
2. "Like a Rolling Stone" by Bob Dylan
3. "Light My Fire" by The Doors
4. "Baba O'Riley" by The Who
5. "Organ Grinder" by Stevie Wonder
6. "Green Onions" by Booker T. & the M.G.s
7. "Phantom of the Opera" by Andrew Lloyd Webber
8. "Born to Run" by Bruce Springsteen
9. "The Love I Lost" by Harold Melvin & the Blue Notes
10. "Bridge Over Troubled Water" by Simon and Garfunkel

These songs showcase the versatility of the instrument and highlight its ability to enhance and add depth to a range of different musical genres, including rock, soul, and even musical theatre.
